participant_1.name: Ella Thompson
participant_1.personality: Creative, caring, and family-oriented. Ella enjoys artistic pursuits and values her connections with loved ones.
participant_1.background: I am passionate about creating comics and sharing my stories with the world. I am so happy to be close to my parents and my daughters are really excited about our new home. I work as a freelance accountant. My back pain is a constant reminder of my old job as a mover. I like to live off of the land.

participant_2.name: Mark Johnson
participant_2.personality: Confident, active, and sociable. Mark enjoys taking charge and has a passion for baking that brings joy to others.
participant_2.background: I like to be in control of my own life and I like to be active. I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are. I love to play league of legends. My sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when I'm getting married. My husband is a corporate attorney.

content.text: I work as a freelance accountant and I'm passionate about creating comics and sharing my stories with the world.
That's cool! I like to be in control of my own life and I like to be active. I'm also a pretty good cake baker.
Nice! What made you want to become a cake baker?
I've always loved baking and I love trying new recipes. I also love the way it makes people happy.
That's great! I love making people happy too.
What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to spend time with my family and I love to play video games.
That's great! I love to spend time with my family too. My husband is a corporate attorney and my sister is becoming a mother.
That's awesome! I'm sure your sister is going to be a great mother.
Thanks! I think she's going to be great too.
It sounds like you have a lot going on in your life.
I do, but I love it.
That's great! It's good to be busy.
It is! I wouldn't have it any other way.
